channel.title: Indian Elections on Hemanth Bharatha Chakravarthy
channel.description: Recent content in Indian Elections on Hemanth Bharatha Chakravarthy

item.title: Chowkidar Campaign: What is the Twitter Sentiment?
item.description: Analysis of Twitter Reactions to the BJP’s #Chowkidar Campaign I analyzed a mixed sample of the most popular and most recent one hundred and eight thousand tweets in English from the last three days (as of 20 March, 2019, 10:07 pm EST) on the Bharatiya Janata Party’s #MainBhiChowkidar campaign. # # Tibble and text processing # temp_1 <- x %>% # # Lose useless columns # select(created_at, text, favourites_count, retweet_count) %>% # # Convert text to lower text # mutate(text = tolower(text)) # # Note: https://hackernoon.
